title: PRICE REDUCTION: T206 T. Cobb (bat off) - SGC A / G. Schaefer - SGC 10
author: h2oya311

posts.post_title: PRICE REDUCTION: T206 T. Cobb (bat off) - SGC A / G. Schaefer - SGC 10
posts.post_content:
I'm trying to clean out my closets and rid myself of cards that don't fit my collecting focus.

I have the following t206 for sale:

T. Cobb (bat off shoulder) - Sweet Cap - SGC 10 - $475
G. Schaefer - Sweet Cap 460 Factory 42 - SGC 10 - $18

First to PM or email me at [url]h2oya311@yahoo.com[/url] with a commitment to buy will be the new owner!  Paypal friend/gift is preferred.

[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/derekgrangerfirstalbum/websize/1909-11%20Cobb.jpg[/IMG] [IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/derekgrangerfirstalbum/websize/1909-11%20Cobb%20_back_.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/derekgrangerfirstalbum/websize/1909-11%20Schaefer.jpg[/IMG] [IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/derekgrangerfirstalbum/websize/1909-11%20Schaefer%20_back_.jpg[/IMG]

still available...bump for price reduction.  

Pay no attention to the back of Mr. Cobb...you want this card....then compare the front to others you've seen on the 'bay...You want this card!...compare prices.  You REALLY want this card! Is it working?
Have you attached scans?  (I cannot see them, at least).
